title: Love that Binds
description: My vow is to you now. My life belongs to you as much as to my Family, to Cosa Nostra.Being Ill Padrino of Cosa Nostra has brought Neal more power over New York than he ever thought possible, but he is still in need of his queen. Scouring the city for Amelia, he seems to be teetering on the edge of darkness, leaving the streets running red with the blood of his enemies. Amelia wants nothing more than to get back to Neal, to get back to her life. But in order to do so, she needs to make a deal with a devil. Being a part of the underworld of New York has left its mark on her in more ways than one. Does she have the strength to be what Neal needs, to rule by his side? Or did Romero ruin her forever?
author: A.J.  Wyatt
